The Training Table Restaurants http://www.dexknows.com/business_profiles/the_training_table_restaurants-b579895/ (801) 377-3939 2250 N University Pkwy , Provo , UT 84604 40.264327 -111.66904 Send to Phone Visit Website View Menu
Description
Own this business? Add an image Categories: Restaurants Write a Review Reviews by Michelle T. - 07/29/2011
Overpriced, but delicious. Beat cheese fire I've ever had. Read Full Review on Yelp.com. by Joe L. - 01/22/2011
The Provo restaurant is now closed. It is being replaced by a JCW's. Read Full Review on Yelp.com. by Jamie J. - 01/22/2011
On the road pit stop:
Meh, I've experienced better sums up my experience here.
A few +'s: - Telephones that you order from your table with! Cool? Yes! - Great friendly staff
Food wise?… Read Full Review on Yelp.com.
